content: Update Field extractor to support dot notation paths
Run cargo build and fix Field extractor errors

Update QueryComponentCount to take field path parameter
Run cargo build and fix QueryComponentCount errors
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Update BrpMethodHandlerV2 to always put response in result field
Run cargo build and fix BrpMethodHandlerV2 errors
Update bevy_list V2 to use Field("result") instead of DirectToResultV2
Run cargo build and fix bevy_list errors
Update bevy_list V2 to use ItemCount("result") instead of ItemCountV2

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Remove DirectToResultV2 variant from ResponseField enum

Remove QueryComponentCountV2 variant from ResponseExtractorType enum
Remove FieldV2 variant from ResponseExtractorType enum
Run cargo build and fix V2 removal errors
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix all clippy issues following warning rules
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
